title: Curated Collections of Fine Furniture, Lighting and Textiles | Baker-McGuire
text: Custom Designed Upholstery Baker Bespoke ushers in a new generation of custom seating that allows you to select every element from design, style, and size drawn from an assortment of classic patterns, tailored to your custom selections. All built to the Baker Standard — and that remains the very best. Contemporary Furniture & Modern Designs From our origins as a humble cabinet shop in 1890 to the glamour of today’s global showroom openings, glittering Hollywood events and more, Baker’s story is one that’s still vital and still evolving. Custom Designed Upholstery With a sketch, a photo, or just a daydream, you can craft your own commissioned creations. From your designs and inspiration, drawings are prepared, and every detail and dimension determined. Save products to My Favorites wishlists. Please contact your nearest showroom if you are interested in opening a Baker trade professional account. Join our newsletter to be the first to know about exclusive new collections, design partnerships, and showroom offerings. Email Sign-Up©2026 Baker Interiors Group
